about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in Venomous, a 2D action-adventure game where precision and strategy take center stage. Play as Venomous, a skilled warrior armed with web-slinging abilities, sharp slashes, and accurate shuriken throws. Navigate beautifully crafted levels, overcome challenging enemies, and engage in thrilling boss battles as you fight to restore balance to your world.

With its focus on thoughtful gameplay, Venomous offers a rewarding experience for players who value skillful combat and exploration.

Key Features

Strategic Combat System: Combine web-slinging, slashing, and shuriken attacks to take down enemies with precision.

Achievements & Progression: Unlock milestones and showcase your mastery as you progress through the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 (32bit / 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8600M Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX-compatible sound card .
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 (32bit / 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8600M Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX-compatible sound card with surround sound support (optional).
